#SKIPFILE: NumberIsFloat

// Some functions return integer results, that are typed decimal or float based on NumberIsFloat

>> Len( "abc") + 1.0000000000000000000000001
4.0000000000000000000000001

>> ForAll( Len( ["abc","defg"] ), Value * 1.0000000000000000000000001 )
Table({Value:3.0000000000000000000000003},{Value:4.0000000000000000000000004})

>> Count( [1,2,3,Blank()] ) + 1.0000000000000000000000001
4.0000000000000000000000001

>> CountA( ["a","b","c",Blank()] ) + 1.0000000000000000000000001
4.0000000000000000000000001

>> CountRows( ["a","b","c",Blank()] ) + 1.0000000000000000000000001
5.0000000000000000000000001

>> CountIf( ["a","b","c","ee",Blank()], Len(Value) = 1 ) + 1.0000000000000000000000001
4.0000000000000000000000001

>> DateDiff( DateTime(1990,3,2,5,20,54), DateTime(2000,6,9,8,30,23), TimeUnit.Years ) + 1.0000000000000000000001
11.0000000000000000000001

>> DateDiff( DateTime(1990,3,2,5,20,54), DateTime(2000,6,9,8,30,23), TimeUnit.Months ) + 1.0000000000000000000001
124.0000000000000000000001

>> DateDiff( DateTime(1990,3,2,5,20,54), DateTime(2000,6,9,8,30,23), TimeUnit.Quarters ) + 1.0000000000000000000001
42.0000000000000000000001

>> DateDiff( DateTime(1990,3,2,5,20,54), DateTime(2000,6,9,8,30,23), TimeUnit.Days ) + 1.0000000000000000000001
3753.0000000000000000000001

>> DateDiff( DateTime(1990,3,2,5,20,54), DateTime(2000,6,9,8,30,23), TimeUnit.Hours ) + 1.0000000000000000000001
90051.0000000000000000000001

>> DateDiff( DateTime(1990,3,2,5,20,54), DateTime(2000,6,9,8,30,23), TimeUnit.Minutes ) + 1.0000000000000000000001
5403011.0000000000000000000001

>> DateDiff( DateTime(1990,3,2,5,20,54), DateTime(2000,6,9,8,30,23), TimeUnit.Seconds ) + 1.00000000000000001
324180570.00000000000000001

>> DateDiff( DateTime(1990,3,2,5,20,54), DateTime(2000,6,9,8,30,23), TimeUnit.Milliseconds ) + 1.00000000000000001
324180569001.00000000000000001

>> Year( DateTime(1990,3,2,5,20,54) ) + 1.0000000000000000000001
1991.0000000000000000000001

>> Month( DateTime(1990,3,2,5,20,54) ) + 1.0000000000000000000001
4.0000000000000000000001

>> Day( DateTime(1990,3,2,5,20,54) ) + 1.0000000000000000000001
3.0000000000000000000001

>> Hour( DateTime(1990,3,2,5,20,54) ) + 1.0000000000000000000001
6.0000000000000000000001

>> Minute( DateTime(1990,3,2,5,20,54) ) + 1.0000000000000000000001
21.0000000000000000000001

>> Second( DateTime(1990,3,2,5,20,54) ) + 1.0000000000000000000001
55.0000000000000000000001

>> RandBetween(11,11) + 1.00000000000000000000000001
12.00000000000000000000000001

>> Hex2Dec( "1234BEEF" ) + 1.00000000000000000000000001
305446640

>> Hex2Dec( "1234BEEF" ) + 0.99999999999999999999999999
305446640
